headline: BP's GTA LNG Project Operates Smoothly Despite Gas Leak
summary: BP's GTA LNG project off Mauritania and Senegal remains operational after a gas leak. Authorities confirm no surface residue as monitoring continues.

raw.headline: BP's GTA LNG Project Operates Smoothly Despite Gas Leak
raw.summary: BP's GTA LNG project off Mauritania and Senegal remains operational after a gas leak. Authorities confirm no surface residue as monitoring continues.

headline: Eni and UKAEA to Build World's Largest Tritium Facility
summary: E and UKAEA are building the world's largest tritium fuel facility, set for completion in 2028. This is a major step toward a clean, sustainable power future.

raw.headline: Eni and UKAEA to Build World's Largest Tritium Facility
raw.summary: E and UKAEA are building the world's largest tritium fuel facility, set for completion in 2028. This is a major step toward a clean, sustainable power future.

headline: Down, But Not Out: My Favorite Energy Stocks For Income And Growth
summary: Despite short-term volatility, the energy sector could deliver long term for investors. Read more on why U.S. producers remain competitive while global demand continues to grow.
